div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

br.p: Huntington Local Schools are closed effective March 16. All activities, athletics, events and programs are canceled through May 1st. These actions are based upon guidelines set forth by Ohio Governor Mike Dewine. Please click links below for important COVID-19 information for our district.
